mapper.select:
SELECT qna_no, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = qnalist.user_no) AS user_id, qna_title, to_char(qna_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as qna_date, qna_readcnt, (select count(qna_re_no) from qna_reply where qna_no = qnalist.qna_no) as qna_replycnt FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(qna qna_pk) */ rownum AS rnum, qna_no, user_no, qna_title, qna_date, qna_readcnt FROM qna WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) qnalist WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

/* Qna - qnaDetail */ SELECT qna_no, (SELECT user_id FROM kap_user WHERE user_no = qna.user_no) AS user_id, qna_title, qna_content, TO_CHAR(qna_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS qna_date, qna_readcnt, qna_thumb, qna_file FROM qna WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no}
